com.tabuto.jsimlife
Class JSimLife

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.tabuto.j2dgf.Game2D
          com.tabuto.jsimlife.JSimLife
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
public class JSimLife
extends Game2D
implements java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

Class JLife represent simple wrapper-class encapsulate objects like Cell Seed and Collision.

Use J2DGF v.0.7.3

Version:
0.2.0
Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
Gene, Dna, Group, CollisionAction, CollisionManager, Serialized Form

update

public void update(java.util.Observable arg0,
                   java.lang.Object arg1)
This class Observe collision Manager, when CollisionMAnager changeState it sends a message to this class, the message is sending by calling the observer update method.

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer
Parameters:
arg1 - is the parameter passed by the Observable class
